resources.string: Follow the steps to setup your app for SMS AntiTheft protection. There are 4 more additional setup required to completed the activation process

Enter one or two phone number with country code eg (+44). Use contact button on the right to choose the phone number from your contacts or enter the number manually if you remember them. SMS AntiTheft will only accept commands from these phone numbers
First password is used to open the SMS AntiTheft application. Second password will be used to validate the command everytime when you send the SMS from authorized number
Enter a secret password, this password will be encrypted on your device and gets validated every time when you send remote command

Send command sms to your lost phone in the following format. Please note: only use this option in-case of emergency or where the client app is not accessible. If this method is used then command/password may be shown on the device lock screen
Alerts are sent through SMS (Charges may apply as per your service provider), it is recommended to activate a free SMS plan
